content:
Does anyone have any code to solve this particular issue that they would be willing to share? :)
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/mobile-menu-sub-menus

Hi, Eliza Olivares. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU
